{"id":613708095,"lang":"cpp","time":"7Â months, 3Â weeks","timestamp":1641406702,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/613708095/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"55.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string addStrings(string num1, string num2) {\n        int sum = 0 ;\n        int carry =0 ;\n        int n = num1.size()-1;\n        int m = num2.size()-1;\n        string res ;\n        while(n >=0 || m>=0){\n            int x = n>=0? num1[n]-'0' :0;\n            int y = m>=0? num2[m]-'0':0;\n            \n            cout <<\"x and y are ...\"<< x << \" \"<< y << endl;\n            \n            \n            sum =  (x+ y+ carry)%10 ;\n            res = to_string(sum)+ res ;\n            carry = (carry + x+y)/10;\n            m -- ;\n            n--;\n        }\n        if(carry){\n            res = to_string(carry)+ res;\n        }\n        return res;\n        \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
